Tutorial1: ^You wake up the day after the attack on the town.
^The day before had been a long slog, trying to assist as many people as possible.
^As you walk out of your bedroom you spot Sylas at a table and he waves you over.
^Scratching his beard he gives you a smile
^"Ah good to see you up! Ready to get to work?"
^You give him a nod, the town won't rebuild itself.
^"Great let me walk you through what's going on!"
^"Since the town was destroyed we can't hold off any more onslaughts from monsters."
^"To get back into fighting shape we need to rebuild but our people are hurting"
^"With your cooking skills you can make magical meals that boost our efforts"
^He stands up from his chair and pats you on the shoulder
^"The fate of our town is in your hands, so choose carefully what you do."
^As he walks to the door to leave to points to the large wooden board next to it.
^"Over there we setup a request board, where people can let you know what they need help with."
^"Sometimes you might not be able to complete everything so pay close attention to what you think is best"
^With that he waves and walks to the door.
^"Don't forget to come meet the townsfolk and see what the town has to offer!"
^As a chef you have the capability to help this town by creating magical meals that can make them strong enough to rebuild.
^Use the request board to find out what needs to be done and then go to the main room to begin them.
^The townspeople are out the door to your right where you can turn in a quest when you're done.
^Be careful what you choose to complete. As each building gives you different buffs going forward.
Tutorial2: ^This is your home base where you can plan out all of your events for the day.
^Note that some actions take time so plan your day out wisely to complete your quests.
^To the right is your expedition table. Where you can plan out your adventures to gather supplies.
^In front of your is your cooking station, where you can craft any meal you want!
^It may be small but with the proper time and resources we should be able to spruce it up a bit!
^If you want to figure out what items you need to craft food. Go to the stove in the back.
^Expeditions will label the types of items each one allows.
^What items you have can be viewed by pressing Q!
Tutorial3: ^This is where the townspeople live and where you can turn in quests.
^Once you've created the correct items as written at the crafting station.
^You can speak to the designated npc and if the building has been created you've succeeded.
^Then go through the other door to end the game.
